New revolutionnary app coming soon

November 19, 2012 . App . Comments
Tags: iphone beer app

Tweet

Note: This news is delivered with love by Luc Chaissac & Pierre Jambet.

Good morning! We have some exciting news for all the beer lovers out there. For quite a long time we’ve been waiting for the perfect idea that would give birth to the app of our dreams. Basically: Intuitive, fluid & attractive.

After months of intensive search for the perfect idea, we realised that the answer had been in front of us the whole time: “beer”. What if we could keep a track of all our beers achievements, and in the meantime keep all our friends aware of what you drink and when you drink it. Add an awesome achievement system, with a slick UI and bam, beech was born!

First version mainly focuses on stability and not on a bunch of shaky features. We already have a lof of ideas for future releases, and new ones keep on popping in our heads every minutes. So don’t worry and stay tuned for more information.

We’re just finishing our 24h kick off session, and we’ll do that kind of intense non-stop design/coding again and again until beech works flawlessly.

Handcrafted in bordeaux by beer lovers for beer lovers.
